name: Knight of Theseus
description:
Created for Brackey's 2020 Game Jam: Rewind

 I decided on a 2d metroidvania boss battle with some time manipulation powers to help you along.  However should you still die, there's one more take on the theme to help you out.  You'll be pulled back through time and allowed to change the choices your character made through life in order to be a little better prepared for this showdown.

There's even a handful of endings available with a whopping, like, 60-ish words each!  Wow!

In all seriousness, this is my first jump into making and finishing a game, thanks for checking it out and I'd be very grateful if you let me know what you think whatever that might be.


Controls:

Arrow keys to jump and move
Z to attack, X to dash, C to save a version of yourself and then C again to rewind yourself back to it.
